Desc.entry: Weekly lessons in Bollywood dance and occasional lessons in Bhangra. Frequent workshops and private tuition available in many styles of dancing including: salsa, latin jive, rueda (Cuban), cha cha cha, samba, lindy hop, bellydancing, street dance, 1920s through to 1970s, disco and world dance. Also available for performances at weddings, conferences and special occasions. Venues and times change frequently, please phone before attending.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Various days and times, please contact for details
